text: Alaha jisa nu cahuda hai maraga darasana karana tam usa da dila isalama la'i khol'ha dida hai. Ate jisa nu kurahe pa'una cahuda hai tam usa ve dila nu taga kara dida hai jivem usa nu akasa vica carhana hai riha hove. Isa tar'ham alaha unham lokam de dilam vica gadagi bhara dida hai, jihare imana nahim li'a'unde
